TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyReference extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedReference
Public NotInheritable Class KeyReference Inherits EncryptedReference

summary.span: 表示 XML 加密中使用的 元素。

span.span: Represents the element used in XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示``元素，其中包含有关加密密钥的位置的信息。The class represents the `` element that contains information about the location of an encrypted key. 使用``元素来引用``使用封闭中定义的项已加密的元素``元素。Use the `` element to refer to `` elements that were encrypted using the key defined in the enclosing `` element. 你可以使用多个``元素时多个``元素存在使用相同的密钥进行加密。You can use multiple `` elements when multiple `` elements exist that are encrypted using the same key. 你可以包括如 XPath 转换、 解压缩转换或如何从文档存储设备，以帮助解密的应用程序检索的元素信息的其他信息。You can include additional information such as XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information about how to retrieve the elements from a document storage facility to aid the decrypting application. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在万维网联合会 (W3C) http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用加密 XML 文档时的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Keyreference/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的新实例类，表示``元素。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element. `` 元素是 `` 元素的一个子元素。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在万维网联合会 (W3C) http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用加密 XML 文档时的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的新实例类，表示``元素，使用提供的统一资源标识符 (URI)。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element, using the supplied Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 此 URI 指示加密密钥的位置。The URI indicates the location of the encrypted key. `` 元素是 `` 元素的一个子元素。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在万维网联合会 (W3C) http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用加密 XML 文档时的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object while encrypting an XML document. summary.span: 使用指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 和 对象为 XML 加密初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for XML encryption using the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的新实例类，表示``元素，使用提供的统一资源标识符 (URI) 和转换链。This constructor creates a new instance of the class that represents the `` element, using the supplied Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and transform chain. 此 URI 指示的加密的密钥和转换链可以包含 XPath 转换、 解压缩转换或如何从文档存储设备中检索加密的数据的信息的位置。The URI indicates the location of the encrypted key and the transform chain that can contain XPath transforms, decompression transforms, or information on how to retrieve the encrypted data from a document storage facility. `` 元素是 `` 元素的一个子元素。The `` element is a child element of the `` element. 有关 XML 加密标准的详细信息，请参阅 XML 加密规范，这是可从在万维网联合会 (W3C) http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。For more information about XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
